recipe.title: Skordalia
recipe.description: Served in generous globs alongside barbecued lamb or fish, skordalia is what you will lick from your fingers and scrape from the bowl.

directions.step: To make the skordalia, soak the bread in water for 5 minutes. Using your hands squeeze as much water out of the bread as possible.
Using a mortar and pestle or a food processor, process or pound the bread, garlic and vinegar to a thick paste.

Slowly, in a thin stream, pour in the olive oil while mixing in with a wooden spoon or whisk until it has all been incorporated and the sauce becomes thick and emulsified. Set aside until ready to eat.
Serve in thick globs alongside roast lamb or fish.

ingredient.name: bread
ingredient.preparation: thick slices of crusty peasant-style bread
